name: Company Funding Records (local/postgresql)
query_template: select {fields} from {table} where {field1} ilike '%{query_string}%' or {field2} ilike '%{query_string}%';
result_mappings:
title='{company} series {round}',body='{city} {fundeddate}: {company} raised usd ${raisedamt}
The company is headquartered in {city} and employs {numemps}',date_published=fundeddate,NO_PAYLOAD
